abstract: Bamidele Mathew Aiyenugba (born November 20, 1983 in Jos, Nigeria) is a Nigerian football (soccer) player currently with Bnei Yehuda of Israel. He was brought in as a replacement for compatriot, Vincent Enyeama, who was sold to Hapoel Tel Aviv. His name, Bamidele, means "Follow me home".
